name: Christopher
text: We had a fantastic stay! The home was spotless, beautifully decorated, with a stunning view. The location was perfect, quiet and relaxing. The host was responsive and made check-in a breeze. Highly recommend!

name: Gail
text: The house was beautiful, comfortable and the setting was tranquil. We spent time here with daughter & granddaughters. The girls LOVED the lake. We all went kayaking daily. Was so peaceful. Great restaurants only 15 minutes away. A place to unwind!
